senses.sense_definition: Bile obtained from the gallbladder of an ox or cow, often used as a wetting agent in watercolor painting or for cleaning.

examples.text: The artist added a drop of <w>oxgall</w> to the water to help the paint adhere better to the paper.
Old-fashioned cleaning bars made with <w>oxgall</w> are surprisingly effective at removing stubborn grease stains.
